column4: Okay, that sounds fine. My 10.04, with which I am talking to you, will keep functioning once I delete the partition?

Okay. I just want to let you know that I don't really have a way to talk to you during the 11.04 installation, except perhaps if we get my Android phone onto Freenode. Just a moment while I delete the wacky partition.
if you are using the partition, like if it is your currently booted os, then gparted cant edit them
androirc is a good free irc client. you have to use wifi tho. vzw (not sure about others) blocks irc thru 3g
